idea:
The company is established with a vision to eliminate waste and recycling them. The mission is to become pioneers in domestic and industrial and urban waste recycling , innovations. The goal is eliminate PET waste and recycling them into all new bottles so that there is reduction of environmental waste on land and water

Manufacturing of PET flakes from wastage PET bottles. Bottles made of polyethylene terephthalate (PET, sometimes PETE) can be recycled and used to manufacture new bottles and containers, thermoform packaging, strapping and are also used in fiber applications such as carpet and apparel.

Flakes produced from PET bottles can be used for various application like fibre industry, pet sheets and many more.
name: NATURECYCLE LLP

idea:
Classroom Hunt is a platform for parents to search and find best school for their child. Classroom Hunt belongs to Appalachian Solutions Pvt. Ltd., company aimed at providing automated solutions. With innovation at the core, Classroom Hunt offers its users the unique experience of discovering the right school for their child.

We are expanding this platform to other educational institutes like private classes, tutors, etc and making it a wholesome experience for Educators, Parents and Students to connect. We also have other products in the pipeline like school automation and PTA app.
name: APPALACHIAN SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
My Name is Prateek Jain, I am working with ByteDance as Executive producer, I am responsible for video production at Tik Tok india, trowbakc is the revolutionary idea Keeping in mind Current & futuristic video demand in the market. We provide professional video editing & creative  services, throwbakc is about giving clients or consumers professional touch on the videos in affordable cost and less time on hourly basis , 

At the same time this app provides work to all the editors and editing agencies as well, 

We provide Services to create videos hourly basis, because Post production setup cost is heavy to our clients. AI would play an important job of segregating requirements for the Consumer (Editors)

& Client as Social media users, families , friends, Creators & influencers, youtubers, corporates.
name: throwbakc

idea:
Everbrite Jewellery & Diamonds Private Limited signifies the commencement of a new era of luxury. Locally manufactured and proudly Indian we promise quality, affordable & beautifully crafted jewellery that will make you shine “Everbrite-ly”. Designed for the young at heart, our jewellery is made of precious metal and the technologically advanced Lab Created Diamonds, each piece houses a glittering centre stone that represents YOU – “The Wearer.”


Years of experience in the industry allow us to create trendy, luxury pieces at affordable prices. Skilled craftsmanship & the latest technology combine to produce flawless jewellery.


Avant-garde technology, Brilliant designs, Consummate Craftsmanship, Dazzling Lab Created Diamonds, Entrepreneur Minds, Love & Gratitude. That’s the essence of Everbrite Jewellery & Diamonds Private Limited.
name: EVERBRITE JEWELLERY & DIAMONDS PRIVATE LIMITED
